name: Inevitable Death
description:
Play as literally the Earth. Save yourself from people, who constantly pollutes and destroys you. 

In this game you have 11 territories with 4 main stats, population, factory number, territory health and nature.

This stats you can change through casting a disasters on Earth. 

Territory health - indicates how much damage can territory sustain before completely being destroyed. Territory gives mana, so try not to lose em. But if this territory causes too much harm, you can sacrifice it

Population - Slowly harm the earth, but as population grow so is its growth is increasing. Watch out for population, once it reaches it critical mass, you would have no choice but to destroy the territory.

Nature - Ease out harm that people cause. 

Factories - Harm the earth and its nature, that way decreasing influence of nature to relief peoples harm to Earth.

Lose condition - If too much harm was caused to Earth; Or if you lose all territories

Control-----------------------

Click and drag mouse to rotate the Earth

Right mouse button - choose territory 

Q - To return rotating the Earth
